name: Convoy Attack
description:
You are part of an Elite Commando defending a convoy providing fuel to support the Army. The enemy will try to destroy your trucks and steal your Fuel supply.

Protect your supply trucks in your convoy:
> Blow up the enemy pick up trucks carrying IDE.
> Destroy IDE left on the road.
> Destroy the enemy fuel trucks which are trying to steal your fuel.
> Collect additional fuel by targeting the fuel barrel.

Convoy Attack includes
>> 27 levels of increasing difficulty
>> 10 Ranks as you master the game.
>> 9 Shooter Badges to collect as you destroy the enemy
>> 9 Grenades to unlock as you become a sharp shooter
>> 1 Leaderboard so you can compete against the Best Players in the World
>> 28 Achievements in the Game Center so you can challenge your Friends
